column4: Can someone help  me I installed Call of Duty and when I try to start it. i get that I don't have opengl loaded. How can I load this?
I have cedega installed
I have a 6800 GT and I had that problem
don't rcompile the drivers with any of the patches
I followed the instructions on Ubuntus website. thread 12823
what speed you getting on glx?
how many fps you getting with glxgears?
Well I was able to run it now it gives and error about glx
I get 7200 give or take 100
How do I load drivers from nvidia website.
This is the kenrel I am running that I compiled... 2.6.10-6600gt-2
All you do is download the drivers depending on your Processor type
for me it was simple you download the file... sudo sh NVIDIA-Linux-x86-1.0-7167-pkg1.run
what kind of card is it?
I had that problem with my Audigy
It is an onboard ASUS Nvidia
thats funny...my onboard VIA AC97 did the same thing......I bought a CT4760 off Ebay for $5
works like a champ the first time around on everything and it was dirt cheap....sounds better than my Audigy too
the killall esd works. That is odd
Thanks for all the help
